title: Project Management Graph Tool
description: A project management application that visualizes projects as a directed graph using Kahnâ€™s algorithm for topological sorting. Includes team management and task assignment.

title: AI-Powered Market Research & Analysis Tool
description: A comprehensive solution leveraging a Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) architecture to automate market analysis. It extracts, analyzes, and synthesizes unstructured web data into actionable, structured reports on trends, sentiments, and key entities.

title: Oil Spill Detection with AI
description: Developed a deep learning model to detect oil spills the sea using SAR satellite images. The project included data preprocessing, model training, and visualization on a web platform.

title: PDF Highlight Extractor
description: Python-based desktop application that extracts highlighted text and comments from PDF files, organizes them, and outputs them into Markdown files. It categorizes highlights based on color or user-defined criteria, making it easier to structure and review important insights.

title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio showcasing my projects, experience, and skills, built with React and Tailwind CSS for a clean and modern design.

title: E-Commerce Website
description: A full-stack e-commerce website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript for the frontend, and PHP with MySQL for back-end. It includes user authentication, product management, and order processing.
